name: Example: Convert existing operational procedures into runbooks
description: This runbook explains how to convert your existing operational procedures into runbooks. It covers file based procedures and web/wiki based procedures.

steps.title: Install the tool: Prepare to copy each of the code blocks from the subsequent steps into their own files
Run the tool to convert some pages from IBM Documentation into runbooks
Set the value of CURL_BASEURL to specify the deployment where you want to import the runbooks to
Generate API key and set the value of CURL_AUTHENTICATION
Test the connectivity to the target RBA API endpoint (optional)
Import the converted runbooks to your deployment
Adjust the tool to convert and import your own runbooks: Before you start
Get familiar with the configuration options, and run the tool to convert your own runbooks
Only if needed: Split large result files and import them individually

parameters.name: CURL_BASEURL
parameters.description: See step 13 for instructions how to create the value for this parameter. You can start with an empty value but you have to supply a value before proceeding to step 14.

parameters.name: CURL_AUTHENTICATION
parameters.description: See step 14 for instructions how to create the value for this parameter. You can start with an empty value but you have to supply a value before proceeding to step 15.
